text: Great write up Marce. Lots of tasty morsels in there
yeah, including one that’s been nagging at me about the model w/ wineries
i don’t think they care about advertising
wineries w/ smaller tasting rooms might be more interested in this
I also didn’t get a sense of urgency - we’re doing fine, we like business our way, no real need to mess w/ it if it ain’t broke
I wonder if that’s the case w/ smaller wineries or larger ones that are more profit oriented
Stoller is a family owned right?
